architecture.description: The project is built using a Microservices architecture with separate services.

setup.install:
## Install

Bun supports Linux (x64 & arm64), macOS (x64 & Apple Silicon) and Windows (x64).

> **Linux users** — Kernel version 5.6 or higher is strongly recommended, but the minimum is 5.1.

> **x64 users** — if you see "illegal instruction" or similar errors, check our [CPU requirements](https://bun.com/docs/installation#cpu-requirements-and-baseline-builds)
setup.run: bun run index.tsx             # TS and JSX supported out-of-the-box
setup.test:
